name: Sally sorts by different criteria
description:
As a customer,
  I want to easily search, filter, and sort products in the catalog
  So that I can find what I need quickly.

  Sally is an online shopper
descriptionHtml:
As a customer,
I want to easily search, filter, and sort products in the catalog
So that I can find what I need quickly.

Sally is an online shopper
statusMessage:
Expecting actual:
  ["Combination Pliers",
    "Pliers",
    "Bolt Cutters",
    "Long Nose Pliers",
    "Slip Joint Pliers",
    "Claw Hammer with Shock Reduction Grip",
    "Hammer",
    "Claw Hammer",
    "Thor Hammer"]
to start with:
  ["Wood Saw"]
